title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including frontend, backend, database, and distribution mechanisms.

title: Design Frontend Interface
description: Create wireframes and interactive prototypes for the user interface, focusing on usability and real-time responsiveness.

title: Develop Frontend Components
description: Implement the frontend components based on the designed interface, ensuring responsiveness and real-time updates.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services to handle user authentication, bid processing, and real-time updates.

title: Implement Database Schema
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user, bid, auction, and other relevant data.

title: Implement Real-Time Bid Processing
description: Develop the logic for processing bids in real-time, ensuring fairness guarantees and scalability.

title: Develop Test Cases for Backend Services
description: Create test cases for the backend services to ensure correct functionality and performance.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Review the codebase for potential security vulnerabilities and implement necessary mitigations.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system architecture, APIs, and usage guidelines.
